about_the_game:
"Chaos of Three Kingdoms" is a role-playing strategy game, the background is based on the turbulent period of the late Eastern Han Dynasty in 192 AD. Players will play a character in the troubled times, which can be a prince, a civil official or a general under the power of a prince, or a character in the wild

This game supports the use of keyboard and mouse to play the game, and the game operation mode is mainly a semi-turn-based method

Currently, the game includes the following features and functions:

1. Up to 1,000 historical figures from the late Eastern Han Dynasty will appear in the game

2. A large map of about 1,200 counties in the thirteen states and hundreds of prefectrues in the late Eastern Han Dynasty

3. Players The identities include princes, civil officials, generals and the opposition, and different operations can be performed according to the identity. The fun of the game is not limited to unifying the world, but the experience of the role-playing process

4. The behavior mode of the large map is a semi-turn mode, which makes the strategy more challenging and realistic

5. The battlefield is divided into mountainous, plain, water and forest terrains

6. The battle will include formation selection, and a reasonable choice can achieve a surprising victory

7. The generals' subordinates include different arms, cavalry, crossbowmen, and crossbowmen mixed operations, and different orders can be issued in battle to conduct fierce battles between the two armies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a turn-based strategy role-playing game set in the late Han Dynasty in 192 AD. You play as a prince, a minister, or an outlaw in troubled times. Your goal is not limited to unifying the world, but more importantly, your choices in this troubled time.
